item.title: Richscape Yelling
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Sorry, my mistake. Replace it with this:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && playerRights >= 0) {
String message = command.substring(4);

            if (playerRights == 0) {
                    Yell("[Player] "+playerName+": "+message+"");
            } else if (playerRights == 1) {
                    Yell("[Moderator]= "+playerName+": "+message+"");
            } else if (playerRights = 2) {
                    Yell("[Administrator] "+playerName+": "+message+"");
            } else if (playerRights == 3) {
                    Yell("[Owner] "+playerName+": "+message+"");
            }
    }[/code]

Read full topic

item.description:
@Ikoedlalampara wrote:

Prima

client.java:5452: incompatible types found : int required: boolean } else if (playerRights = 1) { ^ client.java:5454: incompatible types found : int required: boolean } else if (playerRights = 2) { ^ client.java:5456: incompatible types found : int required: boolean } else if (playerRights = 3) { ^

@itai, no those dont work i dont want your codes, i dont have any co owners just 2 owners… + i can alredy see yours wouldnt work from
playerRights==1 when mines playerRights == 1

item.title: Richscape Yelling
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

No replace with this, you can make it so it shows owner only for u and co-owner for the co-owner

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && !muted) { String text = command.substring(5); if((donator==1) && (playerRights<=1)){ yell("[DONATOR] "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }else if(playerRights==0){ yell("[player] "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }else if(playerRights==1){ yell("[MOD] "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }else if(playerRights==2){ yell("[ADMIN] "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } else if (playerRights == 3 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Co Owner")) { yell("[CO-OWNER] "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } else if (playerRights == 3 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Out 2 Get Me")) { yell("[OWNER] "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } }

Read full topic

@primadude wrote:

Replace it with this:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && playerRights >= 0) {
String message = command.substring(4);

            if (playerRights == 0) {
                    Yell("[Player] "+playerName+": "+message+"");
            } else if (playerRights = 1) {
                    Yell("[Moderator] "+playerName+": "+message+"");
            } else if (playerRights = 2) {
                    Yell("[Administrator] "+playerName+": "+message+"");
            } else if (playerRights = 3) {
                    Yell("[Owner] "+playerName+": "+message+"");
            }
    }[/code]

item.title: Richscape Yelling
item.dc:creator: @Ikoedlalampara Ikoedlalampara
item.description:
@Ikoedlalampara wrote:

OK well i finally finished my yell for richscape base and i made it by myself its here:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && playerRights >= 0) {
String message = command.substring(4);

	playerRights = 0; {

Yell("[Player] “+playerName+”: “+message+”");
}
playerRights = 1; {
Yell("[Moderator] “+playerName+”: “+message+”");
}
playerRights = 2; {
Yell("[Administrator] “+playerName+”: “+message+”");
}
playerRights = 3; {
Yell("[Owner] “+playerName+”: “+message+”");
}
playerRights = 4; {
Yell("[Player] “+playerName+”: “+message+”");
}
}
[/code]
But whenever i yell ingame it says all of them?
like
[player]lamp: msg
[mod]lamp:msg
[admin]lamp:msg
[owner]lamp:msg
[player]lamp: msg

More organized but there it is >.>

Read full topic
